name: Oren Alexander
description: Been with LPG since day 1. They are the best in the business and I expect nothing less from LPGgo.

name: Nelson Gonzalez
description: The team behind LPGgo is the most talented group of real estate videographers in the country. We are already finding ways to incorporate LPGgo into our workflow.

name: Jill Hertzberg
description: Most of all, we are captivated by an integrated and responsible approach to the client, a balanced pricing policy and honesty. We express our sincere gratitude for the fruitful cooperation for a long time, the provision of excellent quality services.
